DOC.brief_summary: This Dental Pain Study evaluate analgesic onset , efficacy safety 1000 mg acetaminophen two Test acetaminophen 500 mg tablet , compare commercial product acetaminophen 1000 mg administer two 500 mg tablet , ibuprofen ( IBU ) 400 mg follow third molar ( wisdom tooth ) extraction .
DOC.brief_title: Study Acetaminophen ( ACM ) Post-operative Dental Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This single-dose , randomize , double-blind , triple-dummy , placebo- active control , parallel-group study evaluate analgesic onset , efficacy , safety profile Test ACM 1000 mg compare two commercial product six-hour period third-molar extraction . Subjects undergo dental extraction three four third molar .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 17 year 50 year old 2 . Weight 100 lb great body mass index ( BMI ) 1830 inclusive 3 . Dental extraction three four molar 4 . Experience moderate severe pain extraction third molar 5 . Females childbearing age must willing use acceptable method birth control 1 . Currently pregnant plan pregnant nursing baby 2 . Known allergy acetaminophen ( ACM ) nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) 3 . Inability swallow whole large tablet capsule 4 . Have condition investigator feel may impact subject 's safety and/or integrity study
